name: Redemption's Guild
description:
Redemption's Guild is an action-packed online multiplayer RPG designed from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Experience pure immersion, adventuring through open world zones, battling waves of enemies in daunting Arenas, or sleuthing for loot in tense, labyrinthine dungeons. Brave the dangers alone or form up to a four-person team and restore balance to Stellaria.

Key Features:


  • Completely designed for VR
  • Teleportation and Sliding modes of locomotion both supported
  • Dynamic enemy AI adapts to player behavior
  • Play solo or up to 4 players per party
  • Customizable classes and multiple paths of progression
  • Change between classes at the Tilnu Tavern and master them all
  • Procedurally generated dungeon labyrinths
  • Open world zones
  • Arenas
  • Collectible weapons and armor
  • Hidden lore and secrets
  • More to come!
